title: Independente (O)
body:
(O)
The first issue of this newspaper was published on August 20, 1846, and the last on May 15, 1847, with a total of thirty-six issues.

Under the same title, eight issues of a newspaper were published, lasting from July 22 to August 20, 1881.

There was a third newspaper with the same title, which had a short duration, with the first issue being released on August 19, 1915.

1846: Publication of the first issue of the newspaper O Independente
1847: Publication of the last issue of the newspaper O Independente
1881: Publication of eight issues of a newspaper with the same title
1915: Publication of the first issue of the third newspaper O Independente
